short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that copies links to clipboard in markdown format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Copy Link" is a useful and convenient Chrome extension that allows you to quickly copy the link of the current web page. It supports various copy formats, including Markdown and HTML, to meet the needs of different users. In addition, it features a user-friendly interface and easy-to-use functions. If you frequently need to copy links in your daily work and life, this extension will be your powerful assistant.
